Banner.Description: Experienced full stack software engineer focused on building robust enterprise solutions and crafting accessible products for the mobile and web. Currently pursuing ML/AI. In an infinite loop of learning & building.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: During my dynamic career spanning over 8 years, I've contributed significantly to numerous high profile MNCs, leading cross-functional teams and operating across various technical roles. I started with enterprise data warehousing and data quality analysis, and more recently transitioned into a proficient full stack engineer for mobile, web and enterprise platforms. I take pride in enhancing workflows via effective CI/CD strategies, implementing system improvements, and executing value-adding project ideas.
I'm comfortable with the following technologies:
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full-stack Developer
Description: Utilized a diverse tech stack including Spring framework, JSP, HTML, SCSS, jQuery, Liferay DXP and Elastic Search to deliver an Enterprise Platform for Central Bank of Malaysia.
Led frontend integration with backend, troubleshooting data definitions and quality assurance fixes.
Designed report generation and visualization charts via 3rd party integrations, executing custom Boolean queries and index handling using Elasticsearch.
Handled Application Security Test fixes, including vulnerable library upgrades, code maintenance, and backend deployment.
Revamped an eKYC onboarding website with a robust camera module, supporting both identification and identity verification using Jumio API.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: Integral member of the core dev team for the DHL Express Mobile App, responsible for continuous fixes, enhancements, and the addition of new features on both frontend and backend.

Key accomplishments: Managed deployments to Playstore and Appstore, spearheaded Ionic 3 to 5 frontend mobile tech refresh, worked on a new feature release for Shipment module, integrated with 3rd party SDKs for Adobe Analytics and Medallia Customer Experience.
Worked on Admin Console upgrades built on Angular frontend, NodeJS backend, MongoDB, which included user access management, configuration management, visual dashboards, and integration with Splunk.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Web Developer
Description: Successfully revamped and redesigned Puffergroup, website, originally built on AppGini.

Led database redesign (MariaDB), core back-end development and optimization in PHP, Linux back-end server setup, and API function creation using Ajax. Additionally, responsible for UI/UX fixes and creation of Bash scripts for metrics collection.

Introduced significant features such as web notifications, Single sign-on, Social interaction between colleagues, Automated metric collection and reporting feature, and easy file upload drag-and-drop feature, among others.
Responsible for the initial research and study of existing solutions, debugging of existing problems faced by the Client, and complete documentation of new solutions.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Data Quality Engineer
Description: Worked in a critical role as a Data Quality Analyst, tackling client issues related to data sourced into and reported from the Enterprise Data Warehouse.
Regularly engaged with finance, sales, marketing, and supply chain end users to monitor and maintain the quality of data feeds, aggregation logic, and reporting layer.

Responsible for correcting and fixing duplication, incorrect transformation, and missing information via logic tracing, implementing changes in ETL dependencies, and creating or modifying SQL patch scripts.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Developer
Description: Served in the R&D team for 'SeaQuest' - an in-house Enterprise Database Warehouse solution owned by Hewlett-Packard Enterprise.
Took on the team lead role for the Malaysia team, focusing on developing new and enhancing existing test suites for HP Database Management system.
Handled a variety of responsibilities including bug fixing, test case design, client software building and releasing, and L4 support.

Used key technologies such as Unix/Linux Shell & PERL-scripting for individual test and test-suite creation, Jenkins, Electric Commander, HP UFT & ALM for test-automation, and Ionic framework for a mobile app POC for real-time metrics relevant to DB Admins.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer
Description: Developed and released a hybrid mobile app called Digital Masjid.
Built on Ionic, NodeJS, Express and MongoDB.

Key features include events subscription and management, automated push notifications using Firebase, rating system, payment gateway for donations using SenangPay, search feature, Google Maps integration, distance calculation based on geo-location for event attendance, points collection & redeem system and marketplace, account registration and administration

Experience.Jobs.Title: Database Admin
Description: Integral part of a team managing and optimizing queries running on the Enterprise Data Warehouse database.
Conducted CRUD operations, database maintenance, identified long running queries, generated explain plans, and executed data extraction and documentation.
Developed new queries and automations for operational and work efficiency improvement.
Worked with a diverse technology stack including HP-UX / Linux Scripting, Java, SeaQuest, Oracle, and ASP.NET.

Experience.Jobs.Title: UAM Global Admin
Description: Entrusted with the responsibility of managing Enterprise user access for 50+ in-house applications within the company/'s User Access Management Platform.
Key responsibilities: creating security profiles, enabling security protocols on the access approval / revoke processes, and developing documentation on databases.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects I have worked on

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Enterprise Platform
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A one-stop SaaS enterprise platform streamlining workflows, service desk, publications, submissions, and access management.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: DHL Express Mobile App
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A customer-centric mobile app for DHL, featuring shipment tracking, delivery management, schedule pickup or drop-off, service point location, shipping rates.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Puffergroup Website
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An infrastructure solution for virtual deployment of enterprise systematic transformation.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Digital Masjid
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An interactive hub for Muslims to Mosque engagement featuring events booking and management, donation, and rating.

OtherProjects.Title: Awards

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Winner of Internship Mini-Project Contest | Hewlett-Packard Malaysia (2015)
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Won the Best Project Award for the POC developed for Finance IT Incident tickets root cause analysis along with KendoUI integration for analytics

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Winner of Final Year Project Exhibition | International Islamic University Malaysia (2014)
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Awarded the Best Project for working prototype titled "User-based Face Recognition". Enlists crowd sourcing to assist authorities and public in finding missing people.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Top 16 Projects | D-Code Startup Bootcamp Malaysia (2013)
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Developed and published Instant GPS Coordinates, a Google Chrome Extension that lets you get Geo Coordinates of any location from Google Maps. Currently unlisted since 2022.

Contact.Pretitle: Do you have a project in mind?
Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: My inbox is always open for new and exciting opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
